name: Cosmic Dreamer Vibes
description: Made from 100% premium cotton, this product offers a breathable and ultra-soft feel, perfect for day-to-night wear. Its cosmic-inspired design features dreamy, celestial patterns that make it a must-have for those who love to express their creativity.Durable stitching and fade-resistant prints ensure lasting quality for your cosmic adventures.

name: Lost In Space
description: Whether you're lounging at home or exploring the city, this cosmic-themed item brings comfort and style together. Designed for dreamers, it features an intricate galaxy motif, crafted with sustainable materials for an eco-friendly choice.

name: Galaxy Explorer Mode
description: Explore the mysteries of the universe with this unique piece, crafted from high-quality, lightweight fabric. The "Lost in Space" design features detailed space-inspired artwork, perfect for adding a touch of wonder to your wardrobe.

name: Stellar Adventure Begins
description: This product is ideal for anyone who loves space exploration and modern streetwear. Made with 95% organic cotton and 5% spandex, it offers a tailored fit with just the right amount of stretch for comfort.

name: Interstellar Journey Ahead
description: Embrace your adventurous side with this stylish piece. Featuring a high-definition galaxy print, this product is crafted from moisture-wicking fabric, making it ideal for outdoor activities or casual outings.

name: Cartoon Astronaut T-shirt
description: The "Galaxy Explorer Mode" product is more than just fashion – it’s a lifestyle. Designed with reinforced seams and a double-stitched hem, it’s built to last through all your adventures. Soft on the skin and vibrant in design, it’s perfect for anyone inspired by the cosmos.

name: Cartoon Astronaut Pants
description: Crafted with adventurers in mind, this piece combines lightweight fabric with a breathable design for all-day comfort. The stellar-themed print adds a touch of excitement and inspiration to your wardrobe.

name: Moonwalker On Duty
description: Designed for those who love to reach for the stars, this product features 100% combed cotton for an ultra-smooth texture. Its vibrant, fade-proof colors ensure it stays bold through every wash.
